name: Dreamers League
description:
Dreamers League is a turn based strategy game. The goal of the game is to build teams of fighters from a selection of heroes and equipments, and then compete against other players' teams in a turn-based combat system.


Team Creation System:
Choose three heroes from the list of heroes available. Each hero has 1 passive skill and 5 active skills. Each skill can be upgraded to be more powerful. You can upgrade 2 skills per hero. You also have a budget of 3,000 coins to buy equipments for your heroes. Each piece of equipment is unique, you can only have one copy of them per team.

Combat System:
 The fight begins with a placement phase where you must place your 3 heroes on the board on the starting tiles of your team (cyan or orange). You can see the details of your team as well as the opponent team at the bottom of the game screen. Once both players have placed their heroes, the fight starts. The cyan team begins. Each of your heroes have several actions and movements (3 and 4 by default). Actions allow the use of skills or usable objects and movements allow to move on the board. During a turn, you control your 3 heroes at the same time: you can move them and use their skills in the order you want. The first team to defeat the 3 opponent heroes wins the fight.


Controls:

A/Z/E/R/T/Y to cast abilities.

1/2/3 or tab to switch between characters.

space to end turn.

The game is still in developement phase (current version:  alpha v0.1). Please tell me if you find any bugs, or if you have some suggestions. The next additions will be:

  • A time limit during placement phase and turn
  • An end turn button (so everything will be playable with mouse only)
  • A leaderboard
  • Add all sound effects
  • More heros
  • More equipments
  • An option menu to change the control

Have fun !
